data.message: hey i saw one of your videos you had on that cross. the cross necklace is a small version of the cross that JESUS carried for YOU. he died for your sins and you curse worse than a sailor. why would you not give your life to the one who DIED for you? so is the cross or todays generation more important. you know if you wanted you could be one of the best role models. please think about this!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
